idea-plugin.name: Mvvm Helper
idea-plugin.description:
Provides different helpers to assist with developing a .NET based MVVM solution:

  • Create ViewModel from within a XAML view (Context Action)
  • Community Toolkit assistance:
    • Make Class (Context Action)
    • Make Field Observable (Context Action)
    • Make Property Observable (Context Action)
    • Create observable property (Context Action)
    • Enable partial properties (Context Action)
    • Make method relay (Context Action)
    • Add NotifyPropertyChangedFor (Context Action)
    • Add NotifyCanExecuteChangedFor (Context Action)
    • Create observable property Postfix template (obsprop)
